scripts.start:playground: yarn playground:clean && yarn build && concurrently "node scripts/build.mjs --watchChanges" "node scripts/playground.mjs --watchChanges"
scripts.build:playground: yarn playground:clean && yarn playground:copy-libs && yarn playground:copy-wasm-module && yarn build && node scripts/playground.mjs
scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc -b && copyfiles packages/renderer/**/*.css && cd packages/renderer && copyfiles **/*.scss **/*.png **/*.glsl **/*.svg ../../.cache/renderer && cd ../../ && node scripts/build.mjs
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn build && node scripts/minify.mjs
scripts.ui-tests: USE_CACHED_DATA=true BROWSER=none start-server-and-test start http-get://localhost:3000 ui-tests:cypress
